caption: A large group of people has gathered indoors, dancing together. Some of them are holding musical instruments. A man and a woman also join the dancing crowd. Another group of people is in the casino, smoking and playing. Some others are drinking. Two individuals are arm-wrestling. During the day, a man and a woman sit together at a dining table, having breakfast. The man suddenly gets angry and overturns the table in a fit of rage. He approaches the woman menacingly, talking to her. After the man had left, a maid comes to assist. Another maid helps the woman get dressed and provides comfort.
